sub-events.comment: Calculate if a new mon is captured.
Returns the id of the mon captured, or -1 if no mon were captured.
Ignore absence of less than 10 sec

action.name: Log
action.param: "This absence wasn't long enough (less than 10 sec)"

sub-events.comment: Repeat for each block of time, the recap what heppened while the game was closed
Else (Trap is empty) and there's still food

action.name: Log
action.param: "Trap " & 3trap.id & " has a visitor: " & Function.Call("mons .name", visitorId) & " who will stay for " & Function.Call("mons .duration", visitorId) & " minutes."

action.name: Log
action.param: "Error in traps.setVisitor: visitorId is below zero : " & visitorId

action.name: Log
action.param: "Error in traps.setVisitor: No trap with nb equal to : " & trapNb

sub-events.comment: Add monsters met in the pokedex

action.name: Log
action.param: "Error in capture.try: No traps exist with id " & trapClicked

sub-events.comment: remove the mon from the trap

action.name: Append text
action.param: Function.Call("mons .name", i) & " left you " & Function.Call("mons .gift", i) & newline

action.name: Add to
action.param: Function.Call("mons .name", i) & " left you " & Function.Call("mons .gift", i) & newline

variable.comment: button id of the trap that will receive the bait
variable.name: lastTrapClicked
